name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Python Engineer with expertise in **Python**, **Django**, and **SQL**, adept at designing and implementing scalable applications. Skilled in utilizing **AWS** and **Kubernetes** for efficient cloud deployment, along with CI/CD practices to streamline development processes. Proficient in **GraphQL** and **REST** APIs, ensuring smooth data interaction across applications. Demonstrates strong knowledge of software development best practices, including **Automated Testing**, **Code Review**, **Refactoring**, and design principles such as **SOLID**, **DRY**, and **KISS**. Experienced in database migrations and ORM integration. Proven track record in delivering robust solutions across diverse industries, complemented by excellent communication and mentoring skills. Committed to fostering a collaborative team environment.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed robust backend services using **Python** and **Django**, achieving a **95% reduction** in response times for API calls.
• Designed and implemented **RESTful APIs** and **GraphQL** endpoints, enhancing data retrieval speed by over **40%**.
• Integrated **AWS** services for scalable cloud solutions, achieving a remarkable **99.9% uptime** across deployed applications.
• Employed CI/CD practices using **Git** and Jenkins, streamlining development workflows and reducing deployment errors by **80%**.
• Utilized **SQL** for optimized database management and operations, ensuring data integrity through strategic **Database Migrations**.
• Implemented **Automated Testing** strategies that increased code quality and application reliability, leading to a **30% decrease** in post-release defects.
• Conducted thorough **Code Reviews** ensuring adherence to **SOLID**, **DRY**, and **KISS** principles, fostering a culture of quality and maintainability.
• Mentored junior developers in best practices and design patterns, promoting knowledge transfer and skill development within the team.
• Refactored legacy code to improve maintainability and performance, resulting in a **25% improvement** in application loading times.
• Leveraged **Kubernetes** for container orchestration, allowing for efficient resource management and load handling.

Utilized **Python** and **Django** to develop robust backend services, enhancing application performance by 30%.

Conducted **Automated Testing** and refactoring strategies that adhered to principles such as **SOLID**, **DRY**, and **KISS**, ensuring maintainability and scalability of code.
Participated in **Mentoring** junior developers with a focus on best practices in **Design Patterns** and **Test Automation Strategies**, improving team code output by 50%.

Developed and maintained scalable backend REST APIs using **Python** and **Django**, ensuring adherence to **SOLID** principles, achieving 98% uptime.
Implemented **GraphQL** for efficient data retrieval, resulting in a **30%** improvement in query performance.

Conducted code reviews and refactoring sessions, developing clean codes that adhere to **DRY** and **KISS** principles, while mentoring team members in best practices.
